Title: God the Savior

Verses.3:
Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord, Jesus Christ, [*]
	who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing, in the heavenly places, in Christ.
Verses.4:
For He chose us, in Him, before the world began, [t]
	that we would be holy and blameless, [*]
	present before Him in his love.
Verses.5:
He always knew we would be his adopted children [t]
	through Jesus Christ, [*]
	because it is His good pleasure and desire.
Verses.6:
To the praise of his glorious grace, [*]
	that he freely gave to us in the Beloved Son.
Verses.7:
In Him we have redemption, by His blood, [*]
	the forgiveness of sins.
According to the riches of His grace, [t]
Verses.8:
which He lavished upon us, [*]
	with all wisdom and understanding.
Verses.9:
He made known to us the mystery of his will, [*]
	according to his good pleasure, that he set forth in Christ.
Verses.10:
His plan for the fullness of times [*]
	is to unite all things together in Christ,
all things in the heavens, [*]
	and the things of the earth.

Changes: 2021-05-24 - Paul Prins: First translation of Ephesians 1 based on Greek, and Latin
